snippet: The lacerated body of a 21-year-old man turned up in a central Queens park early Thursday morning, the police said.
abstract: Lacerated body of a 21-year-old man is found in Forest Park, Queens; police investigation is ongoing.
lead_paragraph: The lacerated body of a 21-year-old man turned up in a central Queens park early Thursday morning, the police said.

headline.seo: Man Found Dead in a Queens Park
headline.main: Man Is Found Dead in a Queens Park
headline.print_headline: Man Is Found Dead in a Queens Park
